meanings.sent1: The skiddiest car in the race easily won first place.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the cars, hers was the skiddiest.
meanings.sent3: The skiddiest puppy in the litter was always getting into mischief.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the skiddiest sound, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The skiddiest banana peel on the sidewalk caused him to slip and fall.

meanings.sent1: This road is skiddiest when it rains.
meanings.sent2: His skateboard is skiddiest out of all his friends'.
meanings.sent3: The skiddiest cat in the neighborhood loves to chase butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was skiddiest when she sang, reaching high notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The skiddiest slope on the mountain made for an exhilarating ski run.
